title: sollOviyattAl
sahitya:
sollOviyattAl un sorUpa dhyAnam sheyya valla kavitai taruvAi


anupallavi

  kallOviyattilum kaLai shoTTum pErinbak-karuNaiyAnandamE kalaiyin sutantaramE


caraNam    poi ahankArattin pOTTi varAmalE pozhudu pOkkavE summA exhudit-taLLAmalE
meyyAna uLLattil ayya nin azhaginai vidavidamAga nAn pudiya polivuDanE
